content.p: The Division of Biomedical Sciences at the Malaysia Campus was established in September 2010. Each year, we welcome some of the brightest students from all over the world to study our 3-year full-time BSc (Hons) in Biomedical Sciences degree within our division in the School of Pharmacy. As an undergraduate student undertaking this degree, you will learn from scientists who have vast experience in their field of expertise, thus endorsing you with valuable scientific knowledge and practical skills for use in the future. To find out more about our Bachelor of Biomedical Science programme, please visit our news and events pages to learn more about activities in the school and faculty and information on upcoming education fairs and other events. UNM's Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Biomedical Science has been accredited by the Institute of Biomedical Science (IBMS), the United Kingdom's leading professional body in the field. All graduates holding an IBMS-accredited degree will be eligible to apply for registration as a biomedical scientist with the Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC) in the UK, upon successful completion of the IBMS Certificate of Competence training portfolio. Read more about the IBMS accreditation Learn more about the field of Biomedical Sciences, including career options. Find out about our degree programmes.
